Title: Provides for the establishment of a forty-five dollar fee for all motions made in pending proceedings and for ex parte applications in the surrogate's court
Summary: Provides for the establishment of a forty-five dollar fee for all motions made in pending proceedings and for ex parte applications in the surrogate's court.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to charging a fee for any motions made in the surrogate's court
